content: I'm glad I could help clarify things for you. Since we're on the topic of loyalty programs, I was wondering if you've considered joining Lufthansa's Miles & More program? As a member, you'll earn miles on your flights, which can be redeemed for award tickets, upgrades, and other perks. Plus, as a Star Alliance member, you can earn and redeem miles across multiple airlines. Would you like me to tell you more about the program?
